short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep Salesforce in your browser wherever you go

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Authify for salesforce saves you time toggling between your salesforce instance and your prospect's target website.  

As you browse, we'll

* pull in all the important account, contact and opportunity information straight from Salesforce
* Allow you to update accounts and contacts with a single click, no more copy and pasting
* Make the most out of your time by quickly deliberating if this prospect already has an account, who owns it, when it was created, its status, and more

Authify for businesses includes unlimited prospect flagging, data enrichment and account governance feature

For detailed information and to create an account head over to https://authify.io
